abstract: Franklin Nieves, Venezuelan prosecutor who has fled to United States, alleges that Pres Nicolas Maduro ordered arrest of opposition politician Leopoldo Lopez; statement comes amid other accusations against Maduro during Nieves' appearance on CNN en Espanol.
lead_paragraph: A prosecutor who fled to the United States said an official told him that the leader of Venezuela had ordered the arrests of several dissidents, including the opposition politician Leopoldo López.

headline.main: Venezuelan Prosecutor Ties Nicolás Maduro to Arrests
headline.print_headline: Prosecutor Ties Leader of Venezuela to Arrests

snippet: A prosecutor who fled to the United States said an official told him that the leader of Venezuela had ordered the arrests of several dissidents, including the opposition politician Leopoldo López.
